verses.verse: Then <S%H116><s%> Darius <S%H1868><s%> the king <S%H4430><s%> made <S%H7761><s%> a decree <S%H2942><s%>, and search <S%H1240><s%> was made in the house <S%H1005><s%> of the archives <S%H5609><s%>, where <S%H8536><s%> the treasures <S%H1596><s%> were laid up <S%H5182><s%> in Babylon <S%H895><s%>.
